keyInfo.info: Replay download URL: https://aoe.ms/replay/?gameId={matchId}&profileId={profileId} — redirects to api.ageofempires.com/api/GameStats/AgeII/GetMatchReplay/. No auth needed. Tested: 499KB replay downloaded successfully.
keyInfo.context: Bruno sugeriu olhar AgeAlyser (byrnesy924/AgeAlyser_2) pra download de replays. Não tinha — mas levou ao DE Replays Manager (Dropbox, não MS) → aoe2insights HTML → URL descoberta. Reddit confirmou: replays ficam em servidor Microsoft, link construído com gameId+profileId.

keyInfo.info: aoe2companion API (PRIMARY): data.aoe2companion.com/api/matches?profile_ids={id}&count={n} — paginated, full history, correct civ names natively. 300 match limit covers full recent history (~5s fetch).
keyInfo.context: Switchou de WorldsEdge (10 matches, civ names errados) pra aoe2companion (141+ matches, paginado, civ names corretos). aoe2.net morreu.

keyInfo.info: WorldsEdge API civ IDs are alphabetical 0-indexed, NOT aoe2.net IDs. Cross-referenced 9/9 confirmed. Use aoe2companion for civ names instead.
Overlay server: port 5555, agelytics/overlay_server.py (FastAPI). Access at http://localhost:5555/overlay. Branch: feature/scouting-overlay (~18 commits).
Live watcher: integrations/openclaw/live_watcher.py — monitors savegame dir for new MP Replay files. Triggers API scouting on new game detected.
Callback handler: integrations/openclaw/callback.sh — routes Telegram inline button callbacks (agelytics_report_{id}, agelytics_analyze_{id}, agelytics_deep_{id}, etc).
Deep Coach style: forensic phase-by-phase format. Style guide at knowledge/aoe2/deep-coach-style-guide.md. NOT generic timeline+insights.
recordGame field in aoe2companion API response indicates if replay exists on Microsoft servers. true = downloadable via aoe.ms URL.
Overlay shows pre-game scouting only (10 min), then hides. In-game timers = borderline cheating per Bruno's call.
Bruno's AoE2 profile: blzulian, profile_id 24635675, Steam ID 76561198028659538, ELO ~619, main civ Franks.
Pandas + seaborn OK in Agelytics (Bruno reversed previous constraint). Used in PDF reports.
Semver from v1.0.0. MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH. CHANGELOG.md in Keep a Changelog format.
v1.1.0 pending: auto-refresh JS (setInterval polling), watcher full automation, branch merge to master.
Opponent replay scouting (killer feature): download 20-50 recent replays of opponent, parse with mgz, show real build order/timing/pattern data in overlay.
keyInfo.context: Killer feature que nenhum concorrente tem (Overwolf/Age of Duck fazem só stats agregados). Replay real do oponente = build orders, timings, padrões reais — não estimativas.

keyInfo.info: v1.2.1 Tactical Impact: use opponent's replay baseline as natural control group for causal inference. Bruno's idea — genuinely novel.
keyInfo.context: Baseline pessoal do oponente como controle natural → impacto causal com confidence scoring. Genuinamente inédito em analytics de RTS.

keyInfo.info: Civ KB complete: 45/45 civs in knowledge/aoe2/civs/. Matchup lookup functional.
Not all replays available on Microsoft servers. Older games get removed frequently. Check recordGame field before attempting download.
